NK001(ka)040:0: spyod 'jug brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)040:1: ston mchog lha mi'i bla ma sh+aakya'i gtso //
NK001(ka)040:2: rgyal sras 'jam dpal dbyangs dang zhi ba lha //
NK001(ka)040:3: dze-t+aa ri dang zla grags chung ba'i zhabs //
NK001(ka)040:4: jo bo gu na sh+r+ai la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)040:5: ka na ka sh+r+ai su ma hi-k+ai rti //
NK001(ka)040:6: blo ldan shes rab slob dpon jo btsun pa //
NK001(ka)040:7: mkhas pa bu ston thugs sras lo ts+aa ba //
NK001(ka)040:8: g.yag phrug sangs rgyas dpal la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)040:9: sangs rgyas 'phel dang phrin las mi bskyod rje //
NK001(ka)040:10: aaaaaaaaaadkon mchog 'byung gnas karma chags med zhabs //
NK001(ka)040:11: grub pa'i dbang phyug pad+ma rig 'dzin rjer //
NK001(ka)040:12: gsol ba 'debs so thugs rjes byin gyis rlobs //
NK001(ka)040:13: nam mkha' 'od gsal theg mchog bstan 'dzin zhabs //
NK001(ka)040:14: bkra shis rgya mtsho rig 'dzin bzang po dang //
NK001(ka)040:15: sems dpa' chen po pad+ma bkra shis la //
NK001(ka)040:16: gsol ba 'debs so thugs rjes byin gyis rlobs //
NK001(ka)040:17: rgyal ba'i sras po gzhan phan mtha' yas dang //
NK001(ka)040:18: drin chen bla ma 'jigs med ngo mtshar dpal //
NK001(ka)040:19: byang chub sems kyi mnga' bdag thams cad la //
NK001(ka)040:20: gsol ba 'debs so thugs rjes byin gyis rlobs //
NK001(ka)040:21: tshad med bzhi yi- zhing sa gshin po la //
NK001(ka)040:22: byang chub sems kyi myu gu rab tu 'khrungs //
NK001(ka)040:23: phyin drug lam gyi 'bras bzang cher smin nas //
NK001(ka)040:24: khams gsum 'gro ba'i nyer 'tsho'i gzhir gyur cig /
NK001(ka)040:25: bdag gzhan mnyam nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis //
NK001(ka)040:26: bdag don gnyis 'dzin 'ching ba kun bcad nas //
NK001(ka)040:27: rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa dang //
NK001(ka)040:28: byang chub sems mchog 'byong bar byin gyis rlobs //
